/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. On the right side of the street, there are buildings visible, their details slightly blurred due to the distance. On the left side, power lines stretch across the scene, a common sight in many cities. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing its blend of natural beauty and urban development.
